data.name: FeedEmptyCommunityDescription
data.value: Anything added to the Community module will be shown here. Users can share interesting information, thoughts and experiences with others, express their opinions, get feedback from the others' comments.

data.name: FeedEmptyCommunityHeader
data.value: No events have been added yet

data.name: FeedEmptyContactListDescription
data.value: The events for the CRM module available to you will be shown here. New companies and persons added or the existing edited, new cases, opportunities and tasks created - everything concerning CRM will go to this tab.

data.name: FeedEmptyContactListHeader
data.value: No CRM events have added yet

data.name: FeedEmptyListProjDescribe
data.value: The changes in the Projects module available to you will be shown here. The projects which you are a member or a follower of, your new tasks or changes to the existing ones will help you not to miss anything.

data.name: FeedEmptyListProjHeader
data.value: No projects have been added yet

data.name: FeedEmptyScreenDescrCorporate
data.value: The changes to the portal documents available to you will be shown here. New documents shared with you, changes to the existing documents that you have access to, documents common for all portal users are all displayed here.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardApps
data.value: Apps you need for productive work

data.name: WelcomeDashboardAppsFirstLine
data.value: {0}Use ONLYOFFICE Mail Server{1} to create corporate mailboxes, add aliases/mail groups.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardAppsSecondLine
data.value: {0}Sign docs with DocuSign{1}. Send docs for electronic signature right from your portal, and receive signed PDF files.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardAppsThirdLine
data.value: {0}Call your clients with Twilio{1}. Make and receive calls right from a web browser using virtual numbers.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardIntegrationFirstLine
data.value: {0}Use LDAP to easily import users{1} and groups from your server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory).

data.name: WelcomeDashboardIntegrationSecondLine
data.value: {0}Enable SSO authentication{1} to let users login with existing credentials.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardIntegrationThirdLine
data.value: {0}Use your own domain name{1} as your portal address.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardTailoredCloudFirstLine
data.value: {0}Choose how many users{1} you need, appoint any number of admins.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardTailoredCloudSecondLine
data.value: {0}Customize your online office{1} style to match your branding.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardTailoredCloudThirdLine
data.value: {0}Edit unlimited number of docs{1}, sheets, and slides simultaneously.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardUltimateSecurityFirstLine
data.value: {0}Enable 2FA{1}, set password criteria, choose trusted IPs and mail domains.

data.name: WelcomeDashboardUltimateSecuritySecondLine
data.value: {0}Configure automatic backups{1} and perform manual ones.
